## alpacon user create

Create a new user

### Synopsis


	Create a new user in the Alpacon. 
	This command allows you to add a new user by specifying required user information such as username, password, and other relevant details. 
	

```
alpacon user create [flags]
```

### Examples

```
 
	alpacon user create
	
```
